entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install with workaround NUGET_CERT_REVOCATION_MODE does no longer work #44123
  • DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer throws an internal exception due to source location outside compilation #44120
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44114
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #44113
  • Add command line option or environment variable to disable workload message #44112
  • Allow integration for SDK references for dotnet fsi (F# interactive) #44110
  • option to ignore SSL error when install/update dotnet tool #44094

Closed

  • Offline dotnet new console #44122
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43563
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43266

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump version of Microsoft.IO.Redist to preview from maintenance-packages #44121
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • create rpms that track inner directories for cleanup #44119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add extra properties for test results in dotnet test #44109
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #44097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Update source-build team references #44118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add local package patterns to source-mappings for online feeds #44076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44085
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44091
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Switch back to 17.8.3 for the minimum msbuild version #43995
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.11
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2558571 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update bootstrap arcade #44086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    Area-AspNetCore
